title: Up/Down Volume Ratio
content:
The indicator calculates the average moving up/down ratio. Calculations are based on bid and ask volumes or on bullish and bearish bar volumes.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Calculation

NameDescription
Calculation Mode Calculation Mode of the Indicator

Options:
  • Up / Down volume
  • Ask / Bid volume
Period Specifies the quantity of recent candles to include in the calculations.
Moving Average Type Defines the type of moving average.

Options:
  • Exponential moving average
  • Linear regression
  • Weighted moving average
  • Moving average
  • Welles Wilders Moving Average
  • Simple Moving Average - Skip Zeros
  • Smoothed moving average

Visualization

NameDescription
Color Specifies the color for this element.

Misc

NameDescription
Show description The parameter controls the visibility of the indicator's name and its parameters on the chart, enabling the display of this information to be toggled on or off.
